post.text: Bernie Sanders TOTALLY gave up and abandoned his revolution. We welcome all voters who want to fix this RIGGED system and bring back our jobs!

comment.author: Shiloh
comment.text: Don't work hard and earn $126,000 a year or your kids can go ef themselves. No respect, done. TRUMP! 2016. #NEVER HER#

replies.author: Donika
replies.text: So nobody should go to college, leave the system the way it is at 8% intrest. Or draw the line somewhere

replies.author: Shiloh
replies.text: Donika how do you draw the line? I grew up highest SATs in my high school but my stepfather who would never pay for my college is who's income I had to go by. Got in to my dream school but at 17 had no idea how to pay for it since I didn't qualify for anything. I believe all or nothing period.

replies.author: Donika
replies.text: There would have to be exceptions. Like the income of your bio dad etc.
